title: What is SoundPay?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [What is GCash PocketPay?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/46909783991705-What-is-GCash-PocketPay)
- [I have a problem with my SoundPay device. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44671600037401-I-have-a-problem-with-my-SoundPay-device-What-do-I-do)
- [What is SoundPay?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44671219480345-What-is-SoundPay)
- [Official GCash for Business MSME Distributors](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39383685151513-Official-GCash-for-Business-MSME-Distributors)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

SoundPay is a payment solution from GCash for Business, designed for small and medium businesses (MSMEs). These features upgrade the old Scan-to-Pay method, giving merchants easier and faster ways to accept payments.

**SoundPay** **plays a sound to confirm successful payments** so merchants can hear when a transaction goes through.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/44671252763673)

To use Soundpay, [register for GCash for Business on the official GCash website](https://new.gcash.com/business/msme).

## Need more help?

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles

- [Get started with GCashPro](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15790006132377-Get-started-with-GCashPro)
- [Manage Funds for GCash PRO Merchants](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/27206497635225-Manage-Funds-for-GCash-PRO-Merchants)
- [Manage your GCashPro account on the GPRO portal](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15769151841689-Manage-your-GCashPro-account-on-the-GPRO-portal)
